Translations.Text: Kare ga chichioya to kare no hitobito ni mukatte,`anata gata wa nani o suhai suru nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa guzo o suhai shi, itsumo kore ni tsukaeru nodesu
Kare wa itta. `Anata gata ga inoru toki kare-ra (guzo) wa kiku no ka
Mata kare-ra (guzo) wa, anata gata o ekisuru nodesu ka, soretomo gaisuru nodesu ka
Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi no sosen ga, koshite iru no o mita nodesu
Kare wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, anata gataga ima made suhai shite kita mono ni tsuite kangaete mita nodesu ka
Anata gata mo, mukashi no sosen-tachi mo (suhai shite ita mono ni tsuite)
Ban'yu no omo o nozoite wa, kare-ra wa watashi no tekidesu
Kare wa watashi o tsukura reta kata de, watashi o michibika re
watashi ni shokuryo o shikyu shi, mata inryo o sadzuke rareta okata
Mata byoki ni nareba, kare wa watashi o iyashite kudasaimasu
Watashi o shina se, sorekara ikikaera se rareru okata
Shinpan no hi ni wa, zaika o o yurushi kudasa reru yo, watashi ga negai nozomu katadearu
Omo yo, eichi o watashi ni sazuke, tadashi-sha-tachi no nakama ni irete kudasai
Watashi o atoato no yo made shinjitsu o tsutaeta mono to shite kudasai
Watashi o shifuku no en o tsugu mono ni nasa re
watashi no chichi o o yurushi kudasai. Hontoni kare wa mayotta mono no nakamadesuga
Mata (hitobito ga) fukkatsu sa se rareru hi ni, watashi no menboku o ushinawa senaide kudasai
Sonohi ni wa, zaiho mo musuko-tachi mo, yakudachimasen
Tada yogore no nai kokoro o, arra ni bo-geru mono dake wa betsudesuga
Rakuen wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni chikadzuke rare
jado ni mayotta mono ni wa, hi goku ga arawareyou
Soshite kare-ra wa iwa reyou. `Anata gataga, agamete ita (kamigami) wa doko ni iru nodesu ka
Arra o soto ni shite (hai shite ita mono) wa anata gata o tasuke rareru nodesu ka, matawa jibun jishin o tasuke rareru nodesu ka
Sokode kare-ra mo yuwaku shita-sha-tachi mo, sono naka ni nagekoma reru
Mata iburisu (akuma) no gunzei mo zenbu issho ni
Kare-ra wa soko de, koron shite iudearou
Arra ni chikatte iimasu. Watashi-tachi wa akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodesu
Ban'yu no omo to doi ni, anata gata o hai shita nodesukara
Watashi-tachi o mayowa seta no wa, tsumibukaimono-tachi nihokanaranai
Sorede watashi-tachi ni wa, dare mo torinasu mono mo naku
hitori no shin no tomo mo nai nodesu
Watashi-tachi ga moichido kaeru koto ga dekirunara, hontoni shinja no nakama ni hairu nodesuga
Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai
Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru
